title: Hurricane below

Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Weather forecasting
Mathematics, Science & Technology/United States. National Aeronautics and Space Administration
description: Episode of Series "Earth science series". Shows how NASA provides early weather warning data from space observations to reduce casualties and property loss from natural disasters such as hurricanes, floods and tornadoes. Includes emotional interviews with people who have lost their homes in a hurricane and shows the devastating aftermath hurricanes can cause.
